entry.title: RGB Color Changing LED Tape Light 10m (33ft) Indoor 24V
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colors
Type:
Price: 109.90

Low voltage cETL certified RGB LED strip light is ideal for indoor lighting and decoration in modern interior design.

This listing is for LED strip only. Please purchase RGB controller and relative LED driver.

Rules to choose 24V LED power supply:

  • 30W adapter can power up to 3.3m (10.8ft)
  • 36W adapter can power up to 4m (13ft)
  • 60W adapter can power up to 6.6m (21.5ft)
  • 90W adapter can power up to 10m (32ft)

Features:

  • Highly Flexible
  • Low Heat Output
  • Extra Long Life:50,000 Hours+
  • Low Maintenance Costs: 7.2 Watts/Meter (2.2W/ft)
  • Minimal cut length: 3.94" (10cm)
  • ETL (US and Canada) Certified LED Strip Light
  • Working temperature ranges from -20 - 40 Celsius degree
  • Protection grade: IP20 indoor
RGB LED Tape Lights are ideal for:
  • Undercabinet lighting
  • Architectural lighting
  • Accent lighting
  • Cove lighting

entry.title: Mini RGB Remote Controller w/ Wireless RF Touch Color Wheel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colors
Type:
Price: 69.90

This Rainbow Dial RGB controller presents an easy and user-friendly way to control RGB LED tape lights. Using the included remote, you can dial in the color you need by using the touch color wheel. The color is displayed in the center of the dial, so you do not need to be in direct view of the tape lights. Remote can be wall mounted. (Bracket and rechargeable battery charger included.)

M3-3A Receiving Controller

Power input:  DC12V-DC24V
Max Current load: Max 3A ×3CH
Max Output power: 108W/216W (12V/24V)
Working Temp:  -30℃ ~ 55℃
Dimensions L135×W30×H20mm
Weight (N.W.):  47g

M3 Mini RGB Receiving Controller Color Wheel

Working Voltage: DC3V (Battery CR2032 )
Working Frequency: 433.92 MHz
Remote Distance: 40-50m
Working Temp: -20℃~55℃
Dimensions: L104×W60×H9mm
Weight (N.W.): 42g

 

Technical information:

Input voltage: 12-24 volts DC
Output voltage: 12-24 volts DC
Current: 9 Amps (3A*3)
Power: 108 watts (12V)  216 watts (24V)
Controller size: 135mm x 30mm x 20mm
Size of remote control: 104mm x 58mm x 9mm
RF range: 40-50 meters
Used frequency: 433.92 Mhz
Connection: screw terminal
Controller weight: 45 grams
Warranty: 1 year

 

Features:

  • On / Off
  • Change the brightness of a fixed color
  • Change the speed of chaining programs
  • Choosing colors via the color wheel
  • Chain 3 colors: Red > Green > blue
  • Chain 7 colors: Red > Green > Blue > Yellow > Pink > Cyan > White
  • Fade 3 colors: Red > Green > blue
  • Fade 7 colors: Red > Pink > Blue > Cyan > Green > Yellow > White
Small figure, big function
Mini controller volume is only 1/3 of the conventional controller, but can implement features such as dimming, RGB and color temperature control.

 

Humanized wall bracket
With this humanized wall bracket which can fix the remote on obviously place of wall,You will not be bothered to find the remote.

entry.title: 120V Flexible LED Tape Light - Retail Package 5M 10M - 3000K Warm White
entry.summary:
Vendor: GENI
Type:
Price: 49.90 - 99.90 (2 variants)

We have two sizes of retail packages: 16.4ft and 33ft. Each package comes with 10 silicone brackets. The connectors are extendable so you can connect several light strips into one lighting strip easily. Maximum length can be connected per electrical plug is 164ft (50m).

These 120V LED Strip Lights are dimmable with most commercially available wall mounted dimmers.

IP67 rated for both indoor and outdoor applications:

  • Outdoor: Decks, Facades, Gardens, Patios, Stairs, Water Features
  • Indoor: Kitchens, restaurants, hotels, bars, cafeterias, bathrooms etc.

Features:

  • Ultrabight LEDs  200 Lumens/Meter (61 Lumens/Ft).
  • Highly Flexible
  • Low Heat Output
  • Extra Long Life: 50,000 Hours+
  • Easy Installation: 120V no need for transformer.
  • Low Maintenance Costs: 4.8 Watts/Meter (1.5W/ft)

entry.title: 120V Flexible LED Strip Lights - Waterproof 3000K Warm White 164ft
entry.summary:
Vendor: GENI
Type:
Price: 479.90

Each 164ft package includes 5 extra power connectors and accessories for custom projects. The driverless LED strip can be customized in any length in multiples of 19.68(in) inches or 50(cm).

120V LED Strip Cutting Instructions

If you like the traditional yellowish color of a conventional lamp this warm white around 3000K would be the ideal choice, this is the most popular choice for homes. Warm white led strips are mainly used in living room, bedroom, hallway.

These 120V LED Strip Lights are dimmable with most commercially available wall mounted dimmers.

Advantages:

  • Perfect for Indoor or Outdoor Applications
  • No Drivers or Cumbersome Transformers Required
  • Quick Install, Plug and Play Out of the Box
  • No Wires to Cut and Solder
  • Cover Long Distances (164ft max) with Just 1 Plug In
  • High Grade Silicone Housing for Added Protection
  • ETL and cETL listed to U.S. and Canadian safety standards.
  • Suitable for wet locations.

 Product Applications 

  • Outdoor: Decks, Facades, Gardens, Patios, Stairs, Water Features
  • Indoor: Kitchens, restaurants, hotels, bars, cafeterias, bathrooms etc.

 Features:

  • Ultrabight LEDs  200 Lumens/Meter (61 Lumens/Ft).
  • Highly Flexible
  • Low Heat Output
  • Extra Long Life: 50,000 Hours+
  • Easy Installation: 110V-120V no need for transformer.
  • Low Maintenance Costs: 4.8 Watts/Meter (1.5W/ft)
  • 3000K Warm White
